narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Surge LLC is a Non-emergency Medical Transport (VAN) provider based in Lake Charles, LA. From 2018-08 through 2019-07, this provider received $197K in Medicaid payments across 5K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.8× the national median for T2003 (T2003), at $40 per claim vs. the median of $22, placing them above the 75th percentile.
76% of billing is concentrated in T2003 (T2003), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-07, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
